C

checkCardNumber(String) - Static method in class javabikes.CreditCard
This methods checks whether the card number is valid.
chooseIfElectric() - Static method in class javabikes.Booking
This methods asks the user if he/she wants an electric bike or a normal bike.
color - Variable in class javabikes.Bike
Color of the bike.
confirmed() - Static method in class javabikes.Booking
This method asks the user for an active confirm of his/her choices.
continueBrowsing() - Static method in class javabikes.Booking
This methods asks the user if he/she wants to continue to browse the bike's database, or if he/she already chose a bike and can move on, to book it.
CreditCard - Class in javabikes
Represents the credit card used by the customer to pay for the bike's rent.
CreditCard() - Constructor for class javabikes.CreditCard
Constructor of the CreditCard object.
Customer - Class in javabikes
This class represents a customer of the JavaBikes self-service rental bike system.

Contructor of the Customer object.
